name: Reclusive
description:
This is the story of a traveler who wanders onto an abandoned island in the Arctic Ocean. His adventure begins with minimal provisions in an unknown and mysterious place, where all sorts of dangers can await in the pitch-black silence. Fortunately, the traveler has a faithful shaggy friend named Jack, who will always help him cope with any difficulties.



On the way the hero will have to collect a variety of supplies, solve quests and move along the plot, which depending on your decisions can lead to a different ending of the adventure story.



During his stay, he catches a signal for help from the captain of a passing ship, who asks him to fix an old abandoned lighthouse so that the ship won't hit the rocks...

Game Features

  • Unique gameplay
  • Resource search
  • Lighthouse repair
  • Darkness comes from all directions
  • Trying to avoid encountering monsters
  • and much more.
